text: The Peace Corps is guilty of enthusiasm and a crusading spirit. But we're not apologetic about it.
author: Sargent Shriver

text: The Dalai Lama's entire being is about peace and harmony, forgiveness and self-discipline. Those are qualities to be admired. I am really looking forward to meeting His Holiness.
author: Joe Nichols

text: The Nobel Peace Prize has become hopelessly politicized. I think it cheapens the prize itself.
author: John Bolton

text: Peace is not the absence of conflict but the presence of creative alternatives for responding to conflict - alternatives to passive or aggressive responses, alternatives to violence.
author: Dorothy Thompson

text: Success is not assured, but America is resolute: this is the best chance for peace we are likely to see for some years to come - and we are acting to help Israelis and Palestinians seize this chance.
author: Condoleezza Rice
